name: Global X Mid-Term U.S. Treasury Premium Yield ETF
longDescription: The Fund will generally invest, directly/indirectly, in a portfolio of U.S. Treasury securities denominated in U.S. The Manager will generally endeavor to maintain a target duration of between five and ten years for MPAY.U, within a certain band, by employing rules-based security selection methodology and weighting. Currently, it is anticipated that MPAY.U will seek to achieve its investment objective by investing in index funds and money mkt. The Fund seeks to provide exposure to the performance of a portfolio of U.S. Treasury securities, generally targeting a duration between 5 and 1 years and high monthly distributions of interest income and option premiums.
